name: Of The Earth
description:
You have a strong connection with the earth. You can draw strength from it and tap into its memory.

Whenever you spend a short rest on the ground outdoors, you regain double the amount of Endurance you normally would.

Additionally, once per rest, you may commune with the earth to get a vague sense of what has happened in the immediate area within the last day. This sense is limited to what the earth itself would have experienced: footfalls, impacts, digging, a muffled sense of sound, etc. Once per Quest, you may further exert this ability to get a deeper but similarly vague sense of major events in the immediate area in the past century.
